001    package com.jeffrick.hibernate.cache;
002    
003    import org.hibernate.cache.Cache;
004    import org.hibernate.cache.CacheException;
005    
006    import java.util.Properties;
007    
008    /**
009     * Simple wrapper of the EhCacheProvider that uses ShardCacheWrapper instead of the default cache.
010     * @author <a href='mailto:jeffrick@gmail.com'>Jeff Rick</a>
011     * Date: Feb 14, 2010
012     * Time: 11:26:51 AM
013     */
014    public class ShardCacheProvider extends org.hibernate.cache.EhCacheProvider {
015        @Override
016        public Cache buildCache(String region, Properties properties) throws CacheException {
017            Cache baseCache = super.buildCache(region, properties);
018    
019            ShardCacheWrapper cache = new ShardCacheWrapper(baseCache);
020            return(cache);
021        }
022    }
